item.title: Events
item.description: After a three-month involuntary health break, we’re excited to return to the stage – on August 15th at 6 PM at Hotel Jiřinka. 2025 | 18.1. at 18:00, Hotel Jiřinka, Dolní Morava | 8.3. at 18:00, Hotel Jiřinka, Dolní Morava | 19.4. at 20:00, Kavárna na Střelnici, Králíky | 3.5. at 19:00, ART Club, Šumperk | 14.6. at 18:00, Hotel Jiřinka, Dolní Morava cancelled for health reasons | 27.6. at 19:30, public library garden, Vamberk cancelled for health reasons

item.title: Playlist
item.description: We play cover versions of the songs: You’ve Got The Love Human Never Tear Us Apart Far Far Every Breath You Take Back to Black Make You Feel My Love Someone Like Me Falling Slowly Heart of Gold Too Much Love She’s Gone Only Love Can Hurt Like This Torn Fields of Gold You Know I’m No Good Don’t Speak Always Remember Us Like This After Love Never Be The Same Again

item.title: Who We Are
item.description: Babeta - lead vocals and piano Míra - bass and electric guitar, backing vocals Marek - aerophone and acoustic guitar, backing vocals Check out clips from the band’s live performance: Never be the same again You know I’m no good Back to Black Stand Up
